original_text: And he shall put some of the blood on the horns of the altar that is in the tent of meeting before the Lord, and the rest of the blood he shall pour out at the base of the altar of burnt offering that is at the entrance of the tent of meeting.
korean_text: 또 그 피로 회막 안 여호와 앞에 있는 제단 뿔들에 바르고 그 피 전부는 회막 문 앞 번제단 밑에 쏟을 것이며

sentences.original_text: And he shall put some of the blood on the horns of the altar
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 피 얼마를 제단 뿔에 바를 것입니다

sentences.original_text: that is in the tent of meeting
and the rest of the blood he shall pour out
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나머지 피는 그가 쏟아낼 것입니다

sentences.original_text: at the base of the altar of burnt offering
that is at the entrance of the tent of meeting
